mapper.select: select p.cover,ps.id as projectStageId, pt.begin_time, pt.end_time, pt.close_time,pt.created_by,pt.created_time,pt.updated_time,pt.description,pt.execute_status,pt.status,pt.user_id,pt.project_id,p.project_name,ps.stage_name ,pt.task_flow,pt.task_name,pt.task_priority,pt.task_process,pt.close_time from pmhub_project_task pt left join pmhub_project p on pt.project_id = p.id left join pmhub_project_stage ps on pt.project_stage_id = ps.id where pt.id = #{taskId}

select pt.id as taskId, pt.begin_time, pt.end_time, pt.close_time,pt.created_by,pt.created_time,pt.updated_time,pt.description,pt.execute_status,pt.status,pt.user_id,pt.project_id,p.project_name,ps.stage_name ,pt.task_flow,pt.task_name,pt.task_priority,pt.task_process from pmhub_project_task pt left join pmhub_project p on pt.project_id = p.id left join pmhub_project_stage ps on ps.id = pt.project_stage_id where pt.task_pid = #{taskId} order by pt.created_time desc

select pt.task_name, p.project_name, ps.stage_name, su.nick_name as executor, pt.status, pt.execute_status, pt.task_priority, su2.nick_name as createdBy, pt.created_time from pmhub_project_task pt left join pmhub_project_member pm on pt.id = pm.pt_id left join pmhub_project p on p.id = pt.project_id left join pmhub_project_stage ps on pt.project_stage_id = ps.id left join sys_user su on su.user_id = pt.user_id left join sys_user su2 on su2.user_name = pt.created_by where pt.deleted = 0 and pm.type = 'task' and pm.user_id = #{userId}

select p.id as projectId,p.msg_notify, p.notify_day,p.status,pt.id as taskId,pt.task_name,pt.user_id,pt.close_time,su.user_wx_name,su.user_name from pmhub_project p left join pmhub_project_task pt on p.id = pt.project_id left join sys_user su on pt.user_id = su.user_id where p.deleted = 0 and p.msg_notify = 1 and pt.deleted = 0 and pt.execute_status != 2

select p.id as projectId,p.msg_notify, p.notify_day,p.status,pt.id as taskId,pt.task_name,pt.user_id,pt.close_time,su.user_wx_name,su.user_name from pmhub_project p left join pmhub_project_task pt on p.id = pt.project_id left join sys_user su on pt.user_id = su.user_id where p.deleted = 0 and pt.deleted = 0 and pt.execute_status != 2
select user_wx_name from sys_user where user_id = #{userId}
select user_name from sys_user where user_id = #{userId}
select nick_name from sys_user where user_name = #{username}
select approved from pmhub_materials_approval_set where type = 'task' and extra_id = #{taskId}
select status from pmhub_project where id = #{projectId}
